test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-1
test-case.description: Test that processing-instruction data does not receive any special treatment.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-20
test-case.description: Space is not allowed between '?' and the target name.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-21
test-case.description: '|' is not allowed in PI target names.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-22
test-case.description: ':' is not allowed in PI target names.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-29
test-case.description: Extract the name from a PI.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-30
test-case.description: Extract the name from a PI.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-31
test-case.description: Extract the name from a PI.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-32
test-case.description: Extract the data from a directly constructed PI.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-33
test-case.description: Extract the data from a directly constructed PI.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-34
test-case.description: Extract the data from a directly constructed PI.
test-case.test: <?validchar content a b c asdada dad ?> eq "content a b c asdada dad "

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-35
test-case.description: Extract the content from a comment.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-36
test-case.description: Extract the content from a comment.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-37
test-case.description: Enclosed expressions aren't recognized inside processing instructions.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-38
test-case.description: Space after PI data isn't stripped.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-39
test-case.description: Mixed content involving two text nodes and one comment node.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-40
test-case.description: Mixed content involving two text nodes and one comment node.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-41
test-case.description: Ensure comment content doesn't receive special interpretation.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-42
test-case.description: A PI target must be specified.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-43
test-case.description: Two subsequent processing instructions as a primary expression is a syntax error.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-44
test-case.description: Test the atomized type of a PI.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-45
test-case.description: Test the atomized type of a comment.
test-case.test: data(<!-- a comment -->) instance of xs:string

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-46
test-case.description: Test serialization of tricky comment content.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-47
test-case.description: Use an ending ']]' string inside a processing instruction.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-48
test-case.description: Ensure xml:id is properly normalized, when using a direct constructor. The value is also an invalid xs:ID value, hence the allowed error code.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-49
test-case.description: Check that an attribute value's value is properly read and serialized. Since the whitespace is expressed with character references they are preserved and hence aren't subject to for instance end-of-line handling. Subsequently, the serialization process must escape such characters in order to not have the parser normalize the values when being read back in.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-50
test-case.description: Ensure that EOL-normalization also takes place in CDATA sections.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-51
test-case.description: Ensure that EOL-normalization also takes place in CDATA sections(#2).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-52
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in text nodes.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-53
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in comment nodes.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-54
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in processing instructions.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-58
test-case.description: Ensure whitespace at the beginning of attributes, isn't stripped.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-61
test-case.description: An unmatched curly in an attribute value template(quotes).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-62
test-case.description: An unmatched curly in an attribute value template(apostrophes).

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-63
test-case.description: '1' is an invalid value for xml:id.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-64
test-case.description: 'PRESERVE' is an invalid value for xml:space.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-65
test-case.description: ' preserve' is an invalid value for xml:space.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-66
test-case.description: Ensure direct element constructors makes namespaces in scope for other node constructors.
test-case.test: declare namespace a="http://example.com/NotThis"; declare namespace g="http://example.com/NotThis2"; { for $i in in-scope-prefixes() order by $i return $i, "|", for $i in in-scope-prefixes(element e {()}) order by $i return $i }

result.assert-xml: a b c xml | a b c xml

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-67
test-case.description: Ensure the default namespace is picked up by independent child constructors.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-68
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in attributes surrounded with quotes.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-69
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in attributes surrounded with apostrophes.

test-case.name: K2-DirectConOther-70
test-case.description: Ensure that EOLs are normalized in text nodes, but not when specified with character references.
